short_description: The Shib Paper is the foundational document for the Shibarium blockchain, detailing a vision for a decentralized society built around the Shib token. It emphasizes enhancing decentralized structures to create a world that balances independence with interconnection. The Shib token plays a central role, symbolizing the community's values and the ecosystem's deflationary model.
long_description: The Shib Paper serves as the comprehensive vision statement for the Shibarium blockchain. It outlines a Proof-of-Stake consensus mechanism involving Delegators and Validators to ensure network security and reliability. Emphasizing Validator expertise, it promotes technological stewardship and equitable access for all Shibizens. The document advocates for fair AI practices and digital ownership rights, fostering a community-centric ecosystem. Core principles include self-sovereignty, decentralization for enhanced security, and user-centric design. The framework encourages innovation, ethical AI utilization, operational transparency, and collaborative growth within the Shibarium ecosystem.
target_audience: Shibizens, Blockchain Enthusiasts, Technologists

short_description: The Telegram Rules outline guidelines for our project's Telegram group to maintain a positive and respectful communication environment. They encourage kindness, respect, and humor while strictly prohibiting harassment, misinformation, spam, off-topic discussions, and negative behaviors to ensure a supportive community experience.
long_description: The Telegram Rules provide a comprehensive set of guidelines for members of our project's Telegram group to foster a safe and welcoming community. The rules emphasize being kind, polite, and respectful, encouraging humor and the sharing of positive energy. Prohibited behaviors include false accusations, harassment, spreading misinformation or fake news, spam, scam activities, off-topic discussions about other projects, begging, sharing wallet addresses, and conversations about politics or religion. Additionally, the rules discourage fear, uncertainty, and doubt (FUD), trolling, repeated negativity, and unnecessary tagging of developers. Adhering to these guidelines is essential for maintaining the group's integrity and ensuring a positive experience for all members.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and participants, looking for community-driven projects.

short_description: Oracle AI ($ORACLE) is a blockchain project on the Ethereum network that utilizes data analytics and AI to enhance investment strategies. It offers features like a Key Opinion Leader (KOL) tracker, influencer analytics, various order types, and innovations such as a Telegram bot, gasless swaps, and AI tools for market insights. The project operates with a simple tax structure on transactions.
long_description: Oracle AI ($ORACLE) is a blockchain project on the Ethereum network that leverages data analytics and predictive models to enhance investment strategies by analyzing market trends and sentiment shifts. Key features include a Key Opinion Leader (KOL) tracker, influencer analytics, various order types, live token metrics, and customizable tools, with exclusive features unlocked by staking $ORACLE tokens. The project plans to introduce a custom Telegram bot, gasless swaps, and AI tools for market insights. Oracle AI operates with a tax structure of 5% on buys, 5% on sales, and 0% on transfers. The project has completed KYC and audit documentation with Cyberscope for security assurance.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and participants in the AI tokenn sector, looking for community-driven projects.

short_description: Sheboshis ($SHEB) is a collection of 20,000 Shiba Inu-themed NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain, expanding the Shiba Inu ecosystem. They introduce an experimental DN404 standard that blends ERC-721 uniqueness with ERC-20 liquidity and shared ownership, offering fractional ownership and utility in the NFT space.
long_description: Sheboshis ($SHEB) is a collection of 20,000 Shiba Inu-themed NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain, developed as an extension of the Shiba Inu project. These NFTs introduce the experimental DN404 standard, combining the uniqueness of ERC-721 tokens with the liquidity and shared ownership features of ERC-20 tokens. This allows for fractional ownership and enhanced utility within the NFT space. Sheboshis are envisioned as companions to the original Shiboshis NFTs, symbolizing themes of love and partnership in the Shiba Inu ecosystem. This project invites enthusiasts to engage in an innovative approach to digital asset ownership and community participation.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and participants in the NFT sector, looking for community-driven projects.

short_description: Treat ($TREAT) is an upcoming token in the Shiba Inu ecosystem designed to support Shibarium's Layer-3 blockchain, featuring Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) to enhance transaction privacy. It aims to serve as the access token for Shib.io and promote community growth through entrepreneurial governance. Please note that $TREAT is not yet trading, and any deployed version is not affiliated with Shiba Inu or their upcoming privacy-focused Layer-3 blockchain.
long_description: Treat ($TREAT) is an upcoming token intended to be a key component of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, specifically supporting Shibarium's Layer-3 blockchain, which will feature Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) to enhance transaction privacy. $TREAT aims to foster community growth through entrepreneurial governance. It will be part of a quad-token governance system alongside Shib, Bone, and Leash, playing a significant role in the ecosystem's technological, financial, privacy, and sustainability strategies. The token is planned to provide liquidity to the $SHI stablecoin, eventually replace $BONE as the reward token for ShibaSwap, and offer rewards in SHIB: The Metaverse and the blockchain version of the Shiba Inu-themed card game, Shiba Eternity. Please be aware that $TREAT is not yet trading, and any deployed version is not affiliated with Shiba Inu or their upcoming privacy-focused Layer-3 blockchain. Conduct thorough research before trading any token claiming to be $TREAT.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and participants in the meme coin sector, looking for community-driven projects.

short_description: Shiba Inu ($SHIB) is the primary token of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, serving as a decentralized, community-led cryptocurrency with zero taxes on transactions. It has a maximum supply of 1,000,000,000,000,000 tokens, a total supply of 589,518,444,636,948 $SHIB, and a circulating supply of 589,269,558,162,219 $SHIB. The token emphasizes participatory governance and a deflationary supply model.
long_description: Shiba Inu ($SHIB) is the foundational token of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, acting as both a decentralized cryptocurrency and a key component of the ecosystem's governance structure. With zero taxes on transactions, it promotes seamless and cost-effective trading for its users. The token has a maximum supply of 1,000,000,000,000,000 $SHIB, a total supply of 589,518,444,636,948 $SHIB, and a circulating supply of 589,269,558,162,219 $SHIB. Known for its widespread acceptance and significant appreciation, $SHIB functions as a medium of exchange and a symbol of the community's values. Its deflationary design, including token burns and other mechanisms, ensures a gradually decreasing supply, enhancing its long-term value proposition. Within the governance system, $SHIB holders participate in community proposals, particularly focusing on charity initiatives and cultural development. This participatory approach aims to maintain $SHIB as a guiding force for the community and the SHIBARMY.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and participants in the meme coin sector, looking for community-driven projects.

short_description: Leash ($LEASH), also known as the 'Doge Killer,' is a key token in the Shiba Inu ecosystem. Originally created as a rebase token, it now has a fixed supply of 107,646 tokens and provides exclusive access to ShibaSwap features and governance rights within the ecosystem.
long_description: Leash ($LEASH), originally designed as a rebase token tied to Dogecoin’s price, now exists with a fixed supply of just 107,646 tokens, making it a scarce and highly sought-after asset within the Shiba Inu ecosystem. Leash plays a key role in the Shiba Inu ecosystem by offering exclusive benefits to its holders, including priority access to ShibaSwap features and governance rights in community decisions. Leash holders are often given exclusive opportunities such as access to special staking pools and the ability to participate in governance votes, reinforcing its importance within the ecosystem. Its scarcity and utility make Leash a vital part of the Shiba Inu project's structure, particularly within the ShibaSwap decentralized exchange and beyond.
target_audience: Crypto investors and supporters of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, especially those interested in unique tokenomics and limited supply tokens.

short_description: Bone ($BONE) is the governance token of the ShibaSwap platform and a key asset within the Shiba Inu ecosystem. It serves as the gas token for Shibarium, the Layer-2 blockchain solution, and plays a crucial role in ecosystem governance decisions.
long_description: Bone ($BONE) is the governance token of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, with a total supply of 250,000,000 tokens. It serves as the essential gas token for Shibarium, the Shiba Inu Layer-2 blockchain solution, facilitating transactions and network operations. In addition to its function as a gas token, $BONE plays a pivotal role in governance, allowing holders to vote on critical proposals that shape the future of the ecosystem. Validators within the Shibarium network are required to stake $BONE, ensuring the security and efficiency of the network. With a staking requirement of 10,000 $BONE for super node eligibility, it encourages active participation and strengthens the ecosystem's decentralized governance structure. $BONE's utility extends beyond governance and gas, contributing to the technological foundation of the Shiba Inu ecosystem and supporting community engagement through ShibaSwap and Shibarium operations.
target_audience: DeFi enthusiasts and Shiba Inu community members interested in participating in governance and decentralized exchange platforms.

short_description: K9 Finance ($KNINE) is a decentralized project within the Shibarium ecosystem, partnering with Shiba Inu to focus on yield generation and capital bridging. It supports Shibarium validators and employs a Liquidity Staking Derivative (LSD) model to maximize returns for stakers.
long_description: K9 Finance ($KNINE), a decentralized finance (DeFi) project and official partner of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, is designed to enhance yield generation and capital efficiency within the Shibarium blockchain. The project aims to create a resilient decentralized finance model through strategic partnerships and innovative liquidity solutions. A key feature of K9 Finance is its Liquidity Staking Derivative (LSD) model, which allows users to stake assets while maintaining liquidity through receipt tokens such as $knBONE, enabling stakers to utilize their capital in trading and other DeFi opportunities. By supporting Shibarium validators, K9 Finance aims to strengthen the overall network security and efficiency. The total supply of $KNINE tokens is 999,999,999,999, with a circulating supply of 309 billion tokens. The project focuses on long-term sustainability, offering investors robust yield generation and efficient capital bridging opportunities within the Shibarium ecosystem.
target_audience: Crypto investors and Shibarium community members interested in decentralized finance and yield generation opportunities.

short_description: Living The Dream ($LTD) is a decentralized advertising platform that launched on August 29, 2024, aimed at bridging Web2 and Web3 ecosystems. It offers precise ad management tools, community-driven governance, and deep integration with the Shib Dream community. The token launched at $0.00003, with Gate.io being the first centralized exchange to list $LTD.
long_description: 'Living The Dream' ($LTD) is a blockchain-based decentralized advertising platform that aims to transform digital advertising by integrating Web2 and Web3 ecosystems. The platform provides advanced ad management tools, interactive campaigns, and crypto incentives, with Ethereum and Shibarium integration for efficient decentralized finance (DeFi) operations. The project supports cross-chain staking and DAO-based governance, promoting community-driven development and sustainable growth. Future initiatives such as DreamCity and DreamTravel are planned to enhance both virtual and real-world experiences. The tokenomics feature a 3% buy/5% sell tax. These taxes are allocated to marketing, development, staking rewards, and strategic token burns. $LTD has a maximum supply of 333,333,333,333 tokens, with approximately 54 billion tokens in circulating supply. Gate.io was the first centralized exchange to list $LTD, and the token launched at a price of $0.00003.

short_description: The LumiBots NFT collection encapsulates the essence of innovation, futurism, and our collective human fascination with technology.
long_description: Lumibots: 'Illuminate the Future' is a unique NFT collection where technology meets tradition, created by the talented Shib Army artists. This collection merges the advanced world of robotics with the classic glow of lightbulbs, offering an immersive digital experience. Each Lumibot is a meticulously crafted piece, ranging from sleek androids to retro cyborgs, embodying the fusion of humanity and machinery. Central to each piece is the iconic lightbulb, symbolizing enlightenment, transformation, and infinite possibilities.This NFT series not only showcases innovation and futuristic vision but also taps into our fascination with technology. It offers a unique digital key to a world where imagination is limitless, encouraging owners to explore the intersection of robotics and traditional light sources. By acquiring a Lumibot, you join a narrative that celebrates the evolution of art and technology, pushing creative boundaries and shaping the future.
target_audience: Crypto investors and Shibarium community members interested in NFTs and yield generation opportunities.

short_description: Mojo is a cryptocurrency project featuring Shib and Bone reflections, aimed at providing rewards to token holders.
long_description: Mojo ($MOJO) is a crypto project, live on both Ethereum and Shibarium, that focuses on rewarding its community. It leverages the concept of reflections, a mechanism where token holders receive additional tokens (in this case, Shib and Bone) as a form of passive income. This approach encourages long-term holding and community engagement. The project details, such as its technical infrastructure, tokenomics, and strategic goals, are outlined in its whitepaper. Mojo is built around the Shiba Inu ecosystem, providing AI solutions, such as a unique, powerful and user-friendly AI image generation system, free to use. Total Supply: 10,000,000,000,000. Buy Tax: 2% (2% Rewards in $SHIB). Sell Tax: 4% (2% Rewards in $SHIB & 2% in Liquidity).
target_audience: Cryptocurrency enthusiasts, particularly those interested in passive income streams and holders of Shib and Bone tokens.

short_description: Toad Killer is a meme token, featuring the $TOAD token, with a theme of dominance over other 'animal' tokens in the crypto world.
long_description: Toad Killer is a unique and playful venture in the cryptocurrency world, diverging from the usual animal-themed token market. It distinguishes itself with its humorous and competitive language, notably claiming superiority over other animal-themed tokens. It uses metaphors like making 'frog soup,' signifying its dominance in the crypto 'animal kingdom.' The $TOAD token reflects this spirit, with a total supply of 420,690,000,000,000. Its tokenomics are crafted to encourage participation and growth: 90% of the tokens are available for trading on Uniswap, and the remaining 10% are kept in the project's wallet. The initial liquidity was set with 10 ETH. Significantly, the liquidity provider (LP) token has been burnt to promote transparency and trust in the project's management. Additionally, the project maintains strong connections with the Shibarium community.
target_audience: Cryptocurrency enthusiasts and investors interested in thematic, animal-related tokens and those looking for new and provocative projects in the crypto space.

short_description: Shibacals is a company that offers a range of physical goods integrated with NFC technology, providing additional benefits like VIP NFT access or surprise coupons.
long_description: Shibacals aims to empower the crypto community by offering a diverse range of physical goods, from fashion items to toys and travel essentials. These products come with an NFC chip for added value, such as VIP NFT access or surprise coupons. The project is integrated with the Shibarium blockchain and focuses on delivering high-quality merchandise. They offer a seamless, end-to-end creation journey for their products, from 3D modeling to global distribution.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and the general public interested in physical goods with blockchain integration.

short_description: ShibaPunkz is the first 10,000 NFT collection fully minted on Shibarium, featuring its own token, $SPUNK, as part of the 'Woofie Town' ecosystem. The project aims to build a strong community focused on crypto adoption and entertainment. It also integrates with $BONE for various features.
long_description: ShibaPunkz is a pioneering NFT collection, being the first to fully mint 10,000 NFTs on the Shibarium blockchain. It features its own native token, $SPUNK, which is integral to its 'Woofie Town' ecosystem. After establishing its NFT collection as a potential original cornerstone of Shibarium, the $SPUNK token has gained increasing traction. The project has also launched the first lottery dapp on Shibarium, initially using $BONE and later incorporating $SPUNK. The token is slated to be the currency for future minting and will play a central role in upcoming Play-to-Earn (P2E) games, where the NFTs will be key characters. ShibaPunkz aims to build the strongest community in Shibarium, educating people on crypto adoption while providing entertainment. It seeks to continue the vision of Ryoshi by pushing for mass crypto adoption and contributing to the growth of the ShibArmy.
target_audience: NFT enthusiasts and crypto lovers who enjoy building a community.

short_description: Baby Brick Inu is a Shibarium-based 'Mutual Fund' offering a 3-token reward system. The project aims to become one of the most trusted on Shibarium, providing an instant diversified portfolio for holders. It also rewards with $BONE.
long_description: Baby Brick Inu serves as a 'Mutual Fund' within the Shibarium ecosystem, offering a unique 3-token reward system. When investors buy one token, they effectively receive three tokens in total, diversifying their Shibarium portfolio instantly. The project's primary focus is to reward its holders 'Brick by Brick,' enabling them to earn $BONE tokens as well. Baby Brick Inu has locked 25% of its supply, which not only adds a layer of security but also acts as a token 'burn' mechanism. This locked wallet accrues both Brick by Brick Tokens and $BONE tokens, effectively reducing their overall supplies. The project aims to establish itself as one of the most trusted initiatives on Shibarium, offering both diversification and rewards to its community.
target_audience: Everyone

short_description: $BRICK is a token fueling the 'Brick by Brick' initiative, aimed at promoting global Shibarium adoption. The DAO wallet, funded by a 3/3 tax and 1.5% $BONE rewards, supports various blockchain projects and innovations.
long_description: Brick by Brick is a comprehensive initiative powered by the $BRICK token, with a limited supply of 100,000 and a 3/3 tax structure. It aims to accelerate global adoption of Shibarium, a blockchain platform. The initiative focuses on educating investors, supporting valuable blockchain projects, and investing in innovative technologies. A 1.5% $BONE reward is distributed to all BRICK holders, while another 1.5% goes into the DAO wallet for various use-cases like marketing and development. $BRICK holders can vote in the DAO and submit suggestions or project proposals, which are reviewed by Teh Foundation. Voting is conducted through the $BRICK DAO Dapp, and holders can 'sacrifice' their tokens for increased influence on critical decisions. The initiative offers affordable promotional opportunities and potential for direct DAO investments.

short_description: WOOF Swap is a ve(3,3) DEX on Shibarium, focusing on liquidity and community governance. It offers fast transactions and incentivization. Earn rewards in $BONE with the ShibArmy.
long_description: WOOF Swap is a community-led DEX on Shibarium, offering liquidity, voting, and rewards. Utilizing zk-rollups for efficiency, the protocol balances reward distribution and encourages strategic voting. Measures are in place to direct emissions to beneficial liquidity sources, aiming for sustainable growth and long-term value.
target_audience: ShibArmy

short_description: Bark is a token that rewards and burns $SHIB for its holders.
long_description: Bark offers its holders 2% $SHIB rewards and burns 1% $SHIB per transaction. The initial liquidity pool was burned, and half the supply was sent to Vitalik Buterin, following $SHIB's original strategy. Bark aims to strengthen both $SHIB and Shibarium communities through its rewards and is the first $SHIB reward and burn token on Shibarium.

short_description: Coinmerge (CMOS) is a multi-faceted Web3 enterprise offering a range of decentralized finance services and products.
long_description: Based in Texas, USA, Coinmerge Technologies Inc. specializes in decentralized finance with over two years in the field. Their core product, the Coinmerge Operating System (CMOS), hosts a suite of decentralized apps for streamlined crypto trading and tracking. Beyond CMOS, Coinmerge serves as a marketing agency and offers a wide array of services like AMA sessions, KYC, and Smart Contract development. Targeting the Web3 ecosystem, they collaborate with Shibarium and Shiba-related projects. Their primary liquidity pair is $BONE.
target_audience: Users of Shibarium Network

short_description: Sharbi ($SHARBI), known as the 'Queen of Memes,' is a multichain token operating on Ethereum, Shibarium, and Solana. It offers rewards in ETH and BONE, features low transaction taxes, and includes a 10-year liquidity lock to ensure long-term stability and trust. The token has a circulating supply of 74,999,697,242 $SHARBI, with a total and maximum supply also capped at 74,999,697,242 $SHARBI.
long_description: Sharbi ($SHARBI) is a decentralized, community-owned multichain cryptocurrency operating on Ethereum, Shibarium, and Solana, proudly holding the title of the 'Queen of Memes.' The project is designed to bridge Web2 and Web3 ecosystems, offering robust rewards in ETH and BONE to its holders. With a 5% tax on both buys and sells, Sharbi maintains low transaction costs while ensuring sustainability through its 10-year liquidity lock and renounced contract, promoting trust, security, and full decentralization. Sharbi's NFT collection is available on OpenSea, allowing users to engage with unique digital assets that complement the token's ecosystem. Additionally, the Sharbi Dream Factory provides essential tools and resources aimed at fostering crypto success and innovation within the community. Governed by a DAO-controlled structure, Sharbi empowers its community members to participate in key decision-making processes, ensuring that the project's direction aligns with the collective vision. The tokenomics are straightforward, with a circulating supply of 74,999,697,242 $SHARBI, a total supply of 74,999,697,242 $SHARBI, and a maximum supply also capped at 74,999,697,242 $SHARBI. This fixed supply model, combined with zero team tokens and developer fees, reinforces Sharbi's commitment to a fair and transparent ecosystem. The project has successfully passed KYC verification and a Certik audit, further strengthening its legitimacy and security within the crypto space.
target_audience: Users of Shibarium, Ethereum, and Solana Networks

short_description: BabySPUNK is a captivating meme token on the Shibarium Blockchain. It offers its holders substantial rewards in Shibarium Punkz (SPUNK) for every transaction. The token imposes a 1% transaction limit and caps the maximum wallet size at 2%. Additionally, its liquidity is locked for a decade, ensuring long-term stability.
long_description: BabySPUNK is not just another meme token; it's a burgeoning community on the Shibarium Blockchain. With a limited total supply of 1,000,000 tokens, it aims to be a valuable asset for its holders. Both buying and selling transactions incur a 5% fee, which is distributed as 1% burn and 4% rewards to holders. The project is committed to long-term sustainability, continually expanding its team with specialists. BabySPUNK is more than a token; it's a movement aiming to spread humor, entertainment, and a sense of community among its holders.
target_audience: Users of Shibarium Network

short_description: ChewySwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) on the Shibarium and Dogechain networks, designed for the Doggy Blockchain ecosystem with features like NFTs, staking, and farming. A portion of trading fees supports animal charities as decided by community votes.
long_description: ChewySwap is a user-friendly DEX offering low fees and multiple earning opportunities for both seasoned DeFi traders and newcomers. Operating on Shibarium and Dogechain, it emphasizes transparency and community empowerment, with 2% of trading fees donated to animal charities. ChewySwap’s smart contracts are audited for security, and its development team is dedicated to maintaining a high standard of service within the crypto space.
target_audience: DeFi traders, Liquidity Providers, SHIB holders, Crypto Newbies

short_description: Chewy ($CHEWY) is the primary reward token of the ChewySwap decentralized exchange (DEX) within the Shiba Inu ecosystem. It is designed to support staking, farming, and liquidity pairing activities, with a tokenomics structure allocating 60% to farms, 30% to pools, and 10% to token burns to ensure sustainability and foster community engagement.
long_description: Chewy ($CHEWY) is the flagship reward token of the ChewySwap decentralized exchange (DEX) within the Shiba Inu ecosystem, operating on the Shibarium blockchain. Designed to incentivize and reward users, $CHEWY facilitates various DeFi activities including staking, yield farming, liquidity pairing, and NFT staking. The tokenomics of $CHEWY are meticulously structured to ensure long-term sustainability and value retention. 60% of the total supply is allocated to farms, allowing users to earn rewards by providing liquidity and participating in yield farming programs. 30% is designated for liquidity pools, enhancing the platform's liquidity and enabling seamless token swaps. The remaining 10% is allocated to token burns, systematically reducing the total supply to increase scarcity and value over time. Beyond its role in financial incentives, $CHEWY is integral to fostering community engagement and participation within the Shibarium ecosystem. Holders can utilize $CHEWY for governance voting, allowing them to influence key decisions and future developments of the ChewySwap platform. Additionally, $CHEWY supports NFT staking, enabling users to earn rewards while holding and interacting with unique digital assets. ChewySwap aims to provide a user-friendly and secure platform for both seasoned DeFi enthusiasts and newcomers, emphasizing transparency, efficiency, and community-driven growth. By leveraging the robust infrastructure of Shibarium, ChewySwap ensures low transaction fees, high scalability, and enhanced security for all its users. In summary, Chewy ($CHEWY) is more than just a reward token; it is a pivotal component of the ChewySwap DEX, driving engagement, liquidity, and sustainable growth within the Shiba Inu ecosystem.
target_audience: DeFi traders, Liquidity Providers, SHIB holders, Crypto Newbies

short_description: Bad Idea AI ($BAD) is a decentralized experiment that merges blockchain technology, artificial intelligence (AI), and decentralization to explore AI’s potential societal impacts. With a circulating supply of 523,935,084,946,765 $BAD, the project partners with the Shiba Inu ecosystem and supports initiatives on the Shibarium blockchain. As a 0% tax token, $BAD focuses on community-driven projects like the Bad Idea AI chatbot system and the BadIdeas.ai AI News platform.
long_description: Bad Idea AI ($BAD) is an innovative decentralized project that combines blockchain technology, artificial intelligence (AI), and decentralization to investigate AI’s role in shaping society—whether it advances human progress or leads to dystopian outcomes. With a circulating supply of 523,935,084,946,765 $BAD, the project is deeply integrated into the Shiba Inu ecosystem and actively supports initiatives on the Shibarium blockchain. The project is community-driven, emphasizing collaborative efforts to leverage AI for societal benefits. It employs a utility-based burn mechanism funded by revenues from advertisements and sales, ensuring sustainable tokenomics without imposing transaction taxes (0% tax token). This approach fosters trust and encourages long-term participation. Key initiatives of Bad Idea AI include the development of the Bad Idea AI chatbot system, which utilizes AI to engage and assist users, and the BadIdeas.ai AI News platform, which provides AI-generated news content. These platforms aim to demonstrate the practical applications of AI within a decentralized framework. By partnering with the Shiba Inu community, Bad Idea AI supports and innovates projects on the Shibarium blockchain, enhancing the overall ecosystem's functionality and security. The token is widely accessible, being listed on major exchanges such as Gate, Bitmart, Bitget, MEXC, LBank, Uniswap, SushiSwap, and ShibaSwap, facilitating ease of trading and liquidity. With comprehensive security measures, including a Certik audit, Bad Idea AI ensures the integrity and safety of its platform. The project's commitment to decentralization and community involvement positions it as a pioneering force in the intersection of AI and blockchain technology.
target_audience: Tech enthusiasts, blockchain and AI communities, and those interested in experimental crypto projects.

short_description: ShibaSwap is the primary decentralized exchange (DEX) of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, enabling users to trade, stake, and farm tokens while earning rewards in $BONE, $LEASH, and $SHIB. Operating on both Ethereum and Shibarium networks, ShibaSwap plays a crucial role in the ecosystem's multi-chain strategy, enhancing scalability and reducing transaction costs.
long_description: ShibaSwap is the flagship decentralized exchange (DEX) of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, designed to enable seamless trading of $SHIB, $LEASH, $BONE, and other native tokens. Launched initially on the Ethereum network, ShibaSwap has expanded to the Shibarium Layer 2 network, significantly enhancing scalability and reducing transaction fees. The platform offers a comprehensive suite of DeFi functionalities, including staking (BURY), yield farming (DIG), and token swapping, allowing users to earn rewards in $SHIB, $LEASH, and $BONE. ShibaSwap is integral to the Shiba Inu ecosystem's multi-chain vision, providing users with efficient and cost-effective financial tools. By leveraging both Ethereum and Shibarium networks, ShibaSwap ensures high liquidity, robust security, and a user-friendly interface, catering to both seasoned DeFi enthusiasts and newcomers. The platform continuously evolves, introducing new features and partnerships to foster community growth and ecosystem sustainability.
target_audience: Shiba Inu token holders, DeFi enthusiasts, and crypto traders interested in participating in the Shiba Inu ecosystem.

short_description: Sheboshis ($SHEB) is a collection of 20,000 unique Shiba Inu-themed NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain, expanding the Shiba Inu ecosystem. Each Shiboshi features distinct traits that enhance their utility in the upcoming Shiboshi Game, offering fractional ownership and interactive utilities within the NFT space.
long_description: Sheboshis ($SHEB) is an exclusive collection of 20,000 Shiba Inu-themed Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) deployed on the Ethereum blockchain, serving as an extension of the Shiba Inu ecosystem. Each Shiboshi is a uniquely generated pixel art Shiba avatar with diverse traits, including different eyes, mouths, headwear, clothes, fur colors, accessories, and backgrounds. These traits not only make each Shiboshi collectible but also enhance their ShibaStrength within the upcoming Shiboshi Game, a blockchain-based gaming platform. Sheboshis introduce the experimental DN404 standard, which combines the uniqueness of ERC-721 tokens with the liquidity and shared ownership features of ERC-20 tokens. This innovative approach allows for fractional ownership, enabling multiple holders to own a share of a single Shiboshi, thereby increasing accessibility and utility within the NFT space. Ownership of a Sheboshi NFT grants access to the SHIBOSHI Social Club, providing members with unique naming rights and special privileges within SHIB: The Metaverse. This integration fosters a vibrant community where enthusiasts can engage in interactive digital experiences and collaborate on ecosystem developments. By blending aesthetic appeal with functional utility, Sheboshis aim to bridge the gap between collectible art and interactive gaming, offering a multifaceted experience for NFT collectors, Shiba Inu enthusiasts, and blockchain gamers alike.
target_audience: NFT collectors, Shiba Inu enthusiasts, blockchain gamers
